snippet: Mesut Özil scored his first goal for his new club as host Arsenal coasted to a 2-0 victory over Napoli in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday.
abstract: Arsenal defeats Napoli, 2-0 in UEFA Champions League match; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mesut Özil scored his first goal for his new club as host Arsenal coasted to a 2-0 victory over Napoli in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday.

headline.main: Özil Scores as Arsenal Blanks Napoli
